title: Where is one for all? :(
body: One for all (IMO) is probably the best game mode above or even next to URF. We haven't seen this game mode in 6-7 months, Ive lost track of how long its been gone. Ascension and Poro King comes up way too often. I like that riot is making these new game modes (Dark star, Blood moon), but please, please balance it out so that we aren't waiting half a year for one game mode.

replies.body:
WHERE THE FUCK IS URF?
Now that we have 10 bans we can have real urf. Not shitty ArUrf.
i just want to have 5 full ad {{champion:59}}  against 5 {{champion:21}}
just wondering: do you have to own the champion in one-for-all? (or free rotation)

i really think they should return the cycle to RGMs being one week, i think it would make everyone happier. even if you like a mode people are still usually sort of sick of it the second week if they spam it, and modes you don't like won't waste two whole weeks
My 14A as Zyra was hands down most fun I had in league for a long margin.

WHEREEE IS THIS ONE FOR ALL !?! 
Please can drop it = l
